website_summaries.verdict: A lively doll that comes with a raccoon to reenact the famous backyard fight from the movie.
pros: This Jack-Jack doll is perfect for younger fans of the movies
Made from durable plastic, he can take rough play but still stay cuddly
When you press his tummy his powers spring into action with lights and sounds
Kids love the different colors and sound effects based on his powers
cons: Some reviewers were expecting a plush body, but were pleasantly surprised with the plastic

customer_reviews.title: Demon Doll
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe my son talked me into buying this demon doll. I know it’s just like the movie, but I was a little freaked out with his glowing head, blue laser eyes, and sporadic cries that occur even when no one plays with him. Sometimes I think I am living with Chucky or a poltergeist, but my son loves this freaky toy. I always wanted him to play with dolls (I thought it would make him more empathetic), and I can’t believe he chose this. Sweat dreams people- don’t fall asleep with this toy in your bedroom; you will probably have nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a Bit Freaky...
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old begged me for this toy. He hasn't seen the 2nd movie yet but he's seen the toy on his youtube videos. He LOVES it. Craddles it... pats it...says its ok Jack Jack I'm here... and he laughs at all the noises it makes. If you press and hold the button though, it does some semi scary things (in my opinion). He makes some really angry noises and flashes red and even does a lightening thing at one point... the eyes will flash... reminds me of a Chucky doll a tiny bit! :D However, my son isn't phased by it. He thinks it's cool... I think its a bit much. :D
customer_reviews.author: Amythyst

customer_reviews.title: Jack Jack
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave enough about this product. Not only was it delivered before explained date with a photo letting me know it arrived, but packaged so well it looked like it just came off the shelf. Now for the product itself, it’s amazing! Soft, durable, and easy to use. Most dolls that can do something are hard and not really comfortable to snuggle with. My granddaughter loves sleeping and playing with it. I’m so impressed. I will buy other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: What a Hit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw the incredibles 2 Jack Jack attack commercial and she immediately asked me for it. It was sold out everywhere and then I found it here on Amazon. It’s a great hit my kids and my nieces love the baby Jack Jack toy. I’m not going to lie it kind of freaked me out but the kids enjoy playing with it so no complaints here. Kids approved!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it... vinyl plastic is just durable and soft enough for a toddler to play with. His little costume is well done it holds up well with my girl constantly getting it off and on the doll. He can sit up and bends his hands at elbows and his head lights up. He makes a bunch of different noiises that makes my kid laugh. little Good toy for a little incredibles fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Porter

customer_reviews.title: She loves her baby Jack Jack!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the Incredibles and had to have her baby Jack Jack. It was the only gift she wanted for Christmas. She literally will carry around her baby Jack Jack, it’s her favorite doll and she’s not really into dolls. She dresses him up and he hangs out in an old car seat, stroller or baby carrier. The picture shown is baby Jack Jack sporting a mop on his head! The noises this doll makes are crazy, for a split second, you think there’s a baby crying in your house. Nope, just baby Jack Jack!
customer_reviews.author: Fit Dad

customer_reviews.title: Kids love Jack Jack
customer_reviews.text: My youngest asked for this doll for her 2nd birthday. Its heavy for her, but she loves taking it wherever she goes. My only issue with this guy is that my daughter has dropped him a few times and he has brown scuff marks on his head that I have not been able to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lembert

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon does not work
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll. The raccoon does not work as described. It doesn’t talk or make any noises whatsoever. Jack jack doll is cute and is quite heavy. My baby boy enjoys tucking him into bed and watching his face turn red. He mostly likes the baby noises he makes.
customer_reviews.author: LittleRed

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: This is not plush. If you’re looking for a squishy, lovey, this ain’t it. This is a hard doll that could knock someone out if you hit them in just the right spot. If you’re kid loved the Jack Jack/raccoon scene in incredibles 2, he or she’ll love this toy. Mine doys.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We brought it for Halloween to complete our family theme. My son loves Jack Jack and wanted to walk around with him. He still plays with it after. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Abraham garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but not a plush and covered in weird itchy plastic shavings
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy but it’s not a plush as stated in the description. The entire doll is hard plastic and the head was covered in a tiny almost shaved plastic-like material. When I wiped it off with my hands, they became incredibly itchy, almost like you’d feel after touching fiberglass. I bought this for my one year son who is going as Jack-Jack for Halloween and the fact that it’s hard, and covered in this itchy stuff is making me regret this purchase. The sound effects and lights are cool, and the arms bend at the wrist and elbows which is a plus. Just wish it was an actual plush and not making me super itchy!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. This only thing I was upset over was when my daughter would play with the raccoon against Jack Jack’s face it creates these marks that won’t come off. So basically it looks like the paint rubbed off. Like I said she loves it so I didn’t bother returning she’s 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Channell

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for xmas. She loves it. The eyes light up and it makes sounds from the film. The raccoon doesn't do anything (i wish it did) but for a small child they will enjoy the added prop. Jack Jack is well built also. He only had about 3 different sounds, and i wish he did more for $40 bucks, but once again, any small child... especially fans on the film, will love and adore this and have plenty of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Paint Runs on Face and Head
customer_reviews.text: Jack Jack figure came with brown paint runs on face, neck, and head... I would've returned or exchanged it but my 4 year old son loves the Incredibles and doesn't mind this. Before you open the package check for defects...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Jack Jack and raccoon are so adorable. My 2 year old is obsessed with Jack Jack and he loves this toy. The noises Jack Jack makes are so cute. My son is very destructive and he hasn’t broken this toy yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: More for the parent
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my 1 year old because he is a red head & it’s a family nickname. He is so scared of this doll when it lights up, wants nothing to do with it, doesn’t even want to watch the movies anymore, since I purchased this. On the upside I place the doll in spots I don’t want my child to go near or get into & it works! Parent win buy
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyeGurl82

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an incentive for playing soccer. I bought it at the beginning of the season and gave it to her 6 weeks later. She was super excited! Only after she opened it, it didn’t work. And now we have a screaming child and we are out of the return window. Ugggg.
customer_reviews.author: terra

customer_reviews.title: son happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: my son has been watching videos of kids playing with the Jack Jack dolls and they have added Jake Jake, Jack Jack's evil twin. So he now has 2 dolls so we can play with Jack Jack and his evil twin Jake Jake, he took his allowance money for the month to buy the extra doll. it seem to be as durable as the other one. We will see how long they last with a 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Pandabear

customer_reviews.title: Kids love him
customer_reviews.text: We all love Jack Jack. The one we bought for Christmas seems a bit defective. The volume isn't as loud as it was when we first took him out of the package. New batteries did not solve the issue. I checked and found Jack Jack on sale, so we bought 2 more for the other kids. And the volume on each of those is noticeably louder. Either way, Jack Jack is a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: KESHA

customer_reviews.title: It works good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas since she been asking siri she wqnted this toy every day. It came jus in time and it works . only thing bad was the box itself that it came in had some tears but it didmt matter to me since she wont use the box.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves him. He always goes after his sisters baby dolls so I thought this would be the perfect gift for him. Its just about the only thing he plays with since opening everything. Makes baby noises, he sounds just like jack jack from the movies. He also lights up which is neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: The doll seems to be in working order.....packaging not so sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what my grandson wanted....the packaging was somewhat ripped up. He won't care about that. I will tape that up.....I just hope no damage was done to the product. I will go on faith here. The outsize (Amazon) box had no damage...had to be pulled from stock that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen LaMountain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👏 gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my 3 year old grandson Omg he loves it it’s head lights red likes fire 🔥 my grandson says. And it’s eyes 👀 light up when the doll is mad 😠 he don’t part with it .
customer_reviews.author: soraida

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but scratched up
customer_reviews.text: This is neat and the kids loved it but when I got ours it had a black scratch on his face. To me it was no biggy because my kids can be rough with toys so eventually this baby was going to probably get more scratches but for others I wanna make aware that it was a little scratched up when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Such a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Such a hit at our superhero Party! This was an impulse buy and I’m so glad I got it. Adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Treshia Backs

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughters 4th Birthday. She was thrilled opening Jack Jack. He is very sturdy, all his powers work and she couldn’t be happier. I expected to pay more for Jack Jack so this was an added bonus for me.
customer_reviews.author: diane bessman

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few months since we got this delivered and child will still not put this toy down. He takes it everywhere with him and it sleeps in his bed at night. It’s holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Just had my son open this for Christmas..... He was so excited. Once we got it out of box we found out it doesn't work. Only lights up on occasion.... Doesn't make any sounds. We changed batteries with new batteries as we thought maybe it was a battery issue but it still doesn't work. Complete waste of money and my son is so let down.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Baby Jack Javk
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been asking for a Jack Jack doll for about two years. I finally broke down for the Christmas. It was not what I wanted to pay for a doll but it was the last one!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Amazon for regifting me a piece of crap but charging me full price toy!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to give this to my grandson. He opened it up and the box was broken and the electronics didnt work. Looks like Amazon gave us a returned broken item!!! Of course my 2 yr old grandson already loved it so we didnt take it away but not happy with Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Carr

customer_reviews.title: It was a Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my 10 month old great grandson. It's a little more toy than he needs at this age, but he likes it and it does everything it is intended to do. Right now it more of a parent/child play time item, but as he gets old he can enjoy it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Posey

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece who loves Jack jack. Its a normal size baby doll, talks, lights up, all kinds of stuff. Come with the little raccoon too. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Czizek

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful 🤦🏽🤦🏽🤦🏽
customer_reviews.text: Almost exactly the same as the one I got from target. I bought it for my one year old daughter because she wanted to open mine and when it arrived and she unboxed it, SHE WAS SCARED OF THE DAMN THING!
customer_reviews.author: Daijah Penn

customer_reviews.title: A little creepy!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was adorable when I purchased it....BUT frankly, it's a little creepy! I thought it was going to be a great bedtime toy - but it's a little loud and his face gets red like fire. He is cute until you press his stomach. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: great lil toy
customer_reviews.text: it's cute, lights up and makes noise. it entertained my boy for about 10mins before he got tired of it ... i played with it for another 15-20mins ... and now it's sitting on the toy bench. was it a fun toy? yes. could it be a much better toy? oh yes. was it worth the price we paid? no
customer_reviews.author: MrFreeze74

customer_reviews.title: Can cause seizures with the flashing otherwise it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby loves this only thing I don't think they should have is the flashing can cause seizures and no warning!!! Should have button on belly for kids to know where to push
customer_reviews.author: Family of 6

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this jack jack! Only problem is after a couple weeks of play it’s glitching and doesn’t want to work half the time even after replacing the batteries and it wasn’t even every day play, it maybe amounted to 6 or 7 days of play.
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters LOVE this toy. They take them everywhere and play with them all day. The only problem I have with them is that they are really creepy! There's no off button and they laugh and scream in the middle of the night. But if you don't spook easily, this is a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jak Jak fans
customer_reviews.text: Before removing packaging all of the noises were in a regular order but now the eyes only light up MAYBE one out of 30 times. And the head is very hard plastic, was expecting a softer toy but kid still loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Just like him
customer_reviews.text: Love this after seeing it on sale at target and thinking not yet for my baby. Wish I got it on sale then for 15, but they discontinued it. So I found it here and love it. He is funny and acts just like my boy with all his monster baby noises haha
customer_reviews.author: Ericka alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This does not work as advertised, but my 5-year-old still loves the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Plush?
customer_reviews.text: When I think of the term plush I think of something soft, this by all means is not soft. It is a hard doll like toy. Everything about it though is exactly as described just not very "plush". My nephew is Jack Jack completely through and through. Sweet and demon all in one so for that alone this toy worked well. He loves the raccoon shaking and the light up eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Jack Jack is special
customer_reviews.text: This toy is amazingly cute. Both my 6 year old and 2 year old grandsons enjoy this fellow. The 2 year old resonates with this character and it's a hoot to watch him with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 3 year old niece & she LOVED it. Bigger than I expected but she was so happy with it & especially when it lit up & spoke!
customer_reviews.author: melanie t

customer_reviews.title: Only had a couple of weeks and it’s already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Great toy at first but after a couple of weeks it stopped working even out new batteries in and still nothing I’m higher disappointed and so is my kid waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: victoria salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: If your child like The Incredibles and baby Jack Jack this would be a must-buy face lights up and has pet raccoon
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. It is pleasantly annoying--just perfect for a four-year-old. She loves it. Just be aware, the head and body are pretty hard, but she does not seem to mind
customer_reviews.author: nytrip911

customer_reviews.title: Fun - a little annoying - but favored toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old thinks he's Jack-Jack. We bought this for him for Christmas and he loves it! The noises can get annoying, but not any more than all the other toys. It's definitely one of his favorites from Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kneib

customer_reviews.title: Jack Jack Rules!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this and calls it his little brother. The doll makes sounds but not the racoon like what the description states bit still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! Plays with it all the time. Sits with him and pushes his button watching his face over and over mimicking the noises.
customer_reviews.author: Sara O. Ko

customer_reviews.title: Jack Jack is the best!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this toy-Jack Jack is his favorite from the Incredibles and this toy was so happy to receive it for Christmas. It’s a great size and is fun to see what Jack Jack will do! The raccoon is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: ladyscholarheidiva

customer_reviews.title: Cute but my kids think its possessed lol
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute but one day out of the blue it said the word One in a different voice my kids are terrified of it
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old niece absolutely loves her Jack Jack toy and accompanying raccoon. Both toys are made of good quality and are durable to multiple drops and bangs (as to be expected for a three year old). I also love all the features including the changes of color and sounds the toy makes. It's a good size and a purchase I'm really pleased with
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dope, a little broken
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this doll. One of his eyes doesn’t light up but she’s still absolutely in love with him. He has to have the raccoon touching him to make the sounds he does with it but it’s holding up physically except for that one eye.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers love it
customer_reviews.text: One of my nephews got this toy for his birthday and all of the other little kids wanted it! I purchased one for another nephew’s birthday because I wanted to be the cool auntie who buys the good gifts :)
customer_reviews.author: Chissssssyyyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Incredibles 2  Jack-Jack Toy: Definitely an incredible toy!!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was incredibly bored this weekend so I decided to let him open one present early before Christmas and his Jack-Jack is what he opened. His face completely lit up when he pressed the toys belly and saw all the things it could do. So thank you!! I would definitely recommend this toy for purchase to anyone. Worth the price and made my nephew happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOLL  IS BEAUTIFULL
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT TWO OF THESE DOLLS, ONE FOR MY 6 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER AND ONE FOR MY 3 YEAR OLD GRANDSON. THEY LOVED THEM. WE ALL DID. VERY FUN DOLL AND VERY WELL MADE.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Schult

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: The toy is very hard and does not work as described. The lights not the interaction with the raccoon toy work consistently and my 5 year old did not pay any attention to this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing beautiful Jack jack
customer_reviews.text: My girl love it and it works great it changes color the noises it makes are the best and its blue eyes turn with lights as well, great product, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Jack Jack incredibles 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my grandson. I know he's going to love it. Even I think it's pretty awesome. I love the fact that it makes sounds and lights up as well. The lazer eyes is pretty cool too. I can't wait to give my grandson this gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer anne Seger

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not equal to play worth
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny and cute for the kid to play with. However after they are done exploring the sounds they are really over it. So from a cost perspective probably not worth it
customer_reviews.author: KipKip

customer_reviews.title: Expect scuff marks almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Had him out of the box 10 MINUTES....I kid you not, 10 MINUTES, and he already is covered in scuff marks! My son was not being rough with it or throwing it, was playing indoors. Unbelievable. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: great idea- poor execution
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it. They laughed at the fire and laser eyes. Within less than half a day, laser eyes stopped working. Should also have the choice between pressing for fire and pressing for laser eyes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, doesn’t necessarily interact with raccoon. I’m not sure if that was one of the posted features of this toy. Sturdy enough for a two year old to toss it around
customer_reviews.author: Y.Ace

customer_reviews.title: Jack-Jack is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody loves Jack-Jack and for good reason. This doll is just amazingly fun. Lots of sounds and his head lights-up when he gets really upset.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Woolery

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for the jackjack lover!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves JackJack and this was the perfect toy for her! He lights up and makes sounds and interacts with the cute raccoon. We have purchased other JackJack toys and this one, hands down, has been the best. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my niece who loves baby jack jack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Baby Jack Jack
customer_reviews.text: My baby's favorite Chrismtas gift last year!! This New Year, Baby Jack Jack is still working good.
customer_reviews.author: JJ and Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is too cool, can't wait to see my grandson to open for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: DONNA LUNSFORD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this toy. The nose cracked and then literally fell off. I have the doll for not even a week and a half. My son is Very upset. I threw away the box. I wish I could return it and get my money back or replace it with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my daughters. It was on Sunday. On Monday it didn’t work. We changed batteries byt still no living signs. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: evadace

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sounds and lights up
customer_reviews.text: It’s bendable and the perfect size for toddlers to hold and carry. My 2 1/2 year old loves this. It is a hard plastic, so it’s not really for sleep but plenty of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle E.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The toy is nice the perosn i was going give it to you scared and the box was in bad shape so i sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says Jack Jack is her boyfriend.... we love this toy
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Toy is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, tall enough, makes sounds and changes color. It also comes with raccoon. Everything as advertised and you cannot beat the price! My three year old daughter loves it 🥰
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: FABULIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I THINK I LOVE JACK JACK AS MUCH AS MY 3 TODDLERS DO. I CAN'T STOP PUSHING HIS BELLY TO TURN HIM FLAMING RED. HAHAHAHAHAHA
customer_reviews.author: Athena M. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money. Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My wild child grandson plays hard with his Jack Jack ... still kickin! Definitely a favorite
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I took off 1 star for the head being so heavy but my daughter loves it and the button is really easy to push so all in all we like it.
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Well made...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift , for my granddaughter. She was scared at first, with the changing lite head. Loved it after she qot used toit.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited when he received this doll for Christmas. It is a really cute doll.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: True to the movie looks, authentic size , kids loved it. Very adorable. Lights and sounds work great. I purchased two in total
customer_reviews.author: Taharvey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun Jack toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit & a lot of fun at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie582

customer_reviews.title: Great toy ! Love jack jack!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they love it! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: BELLA AME

customer_reviews.title: JACK JACK BABY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable.....bought it for myself just because I love Jack Jack...price was right and shipping was fast...highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: joeramble

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Jack-Jack is absolutely adorable. I bought him for myself and I'm 47...Lol This is my new baby. I love to press his belly and see him laugh, change colors and his eyes light up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves Jack Jack. But it's a little creepy when it yells lol.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: cutest toy ever
customer_reviews.text: i and my 9 month old son love this toy lol, its so cute and he laughs everytime it makes the fart like noises and turns red
customer_reviews.author: mine yener

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos love him
customer_reviews.text: I call it the devil doll but the kiddos love him. Had to buy a second one since my 4 year old wouldn’t share him.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect animation/sounds for young children
customer_reviews.text: 1 yr old grandson who looks like character Jack Jack. Great sounds and animation to keep him busy and laughing
customer_reviews.author: M. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Really cute for my 3 year old. Toy was just as described. Wish there was more instruction on what it all does.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my afult special needs family member and he loved it. Came a day late but he was still happy to have it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Hot Ticket
customer_reviews.text: This Jack Jack was sold it pretty early on, half to have found it at a decent price. Every works and as described !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew loves this toy for Christmas. Jacks powers are Super cool and his sidekick raccoon is cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is awesome! my one year old loves her Jack Jack!! store delivered promptly and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Myra R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Both my granddaughters, ages 7 months and 1 year, absolutely love this toy! Lots of settings on this toy to keep it intersting. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Laloop

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My nine month old LOVES his Jack Jack Doll. He looks like him too. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Its annoying to an adult but the kids love it....
customer_reviews.text: Its annoying to an adult but the kids love it....
customer_reviews.author: Ria H Corbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this, we hit mcdonalds for a happy meal, we walk in holding hands and I'm holding jackjack and shes holding on to the raccoon. We recieved a multitude of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jakester88

customer_reviews.title: Creepy, possessed toy
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks so cute, then you push the tummy and it acts possessed. Too scary for a little kid, or should be.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Bigger

customer_reviews.title: Not plush
customer_reviews.text: All hard plastic, no "plush" but the face does light up several different colors based on his sounds & the "laser eyes" look awesome
customer_reviews.author: brandon gagne

product_meta.title: The Incredibles 2 Jack-Jack Plush-Figure Features Lights & Sounds and Comes with Raccoon Toy
product_meta.description: Little Jack-Jack is full of surprises and no one knows what to expect from him, especially when he can go from spontaneously combusting and shooting lasers from his eyes to just being adorable in the blink of an eye! Recreate the most epic battle of all time as Jack-Jack takes on the Backyard Invader! Press on Jack-Jack’s tummy and watch him “attack” with all his might! Recommended for Ages: 3+
feature_bullets: Jack-Jack is full of surprises and no one knows what to expect from him
Press his tummy to hear him laugh, giggle and go through all his "powers" cycle
Press and hold his belly to make Jack-Jack “explode” into ultimate power mode – all colors, lights and sounds are activated
Jack-Jack has rooted hair, molded head and hands. Jack-Jack: plastic / polyester. Raccoon: plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,706 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
